donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The communications plan (in line with One UN communications strategy) aims at spreading information and awareness around the work and impact of the United Nations work in Albania through the Government of Albania-United Nations Programme of Cooperation 2012-2016. It also aims at raising awareness about and increase the visibility of the United Nations in Albania, while maintaining and highlighting the diversity of UN agencies through the promotion of their comparative advantages and technical expertise.
The communications plan includes support to media development in Albania and use of social media to maximize UN's targeted audience and strengthening of internal communications as key to keepings staff informed on the new PoC. The Communications plan includes celebrations of several United Nations Days which will be used as advocacy tools for issues of interest to the country and the UN.

project_descr: Communicating the Government of Albania-UN Programme of Cooperation 2012 - 2016.
